Wed, 08 Nov 2023 12:00:00 +0000 2023-11-08T12:00:06.180+00:00 TechnologynewsCoinMarketCapCertiKcrypto marketsEthereumBitcoinThe number of new tokens (excluding memecoins) added each quarter to CoinMarketCap fell in the most-recent period to its lowest since at least the first quarter of 2021.
